about_the_game:
Step into the gritty world of SLAVFIGHT, the electrifying (and not-even-fully-finished!) 2D platformer where chaos and combat collide in a dystopian, slav-punk universe (slav-punk: just like cyberpunk, but worse!). Whether you’re battling it out with friends or delving into an immersive single-player experience (a whole one hour of it!!1), SLAVFIGHT offers a unique blend of frenetic action and captivating storytelling (there's fart jokes).

features:

  • Local Multiplayer: Challenge up to 4 friends locally or join forces online using 'Steam Play Together.' Engage in high-octane PvP action across six uniquely designed maps, each offering dynamic arenas and tactical depth.

  • PvP Mayhem: Show off your skills in intense multiplayer battles where quick reflexes and strategic thinking are key. With each match featuring different maps and hazards, the thrill never fades.

  • Single-Player/Co-op Adventure: Immerse yourself in the gripping storyline of a near-future dystopia, where technology and despair intertwine. Explore a portion of the narrative that follows an underdog's rise against a backdrop of post-war devastation and rising authority.

  • Dystopian, Slav-Punk Aesthetic: Experience a visually striking world (it's actually all 2d pixelart and crappy-looking but shhh) that fuses cyberpunk influences with a raw, post-apocalyptic edge. From advanced weaponry to futuristic settings, every element adds depth to this dark and intriguing universe.

  • Epic Storyline: Begin your journey from the depths of obscurity to a legendary confrontation. This game offers a glimpse into the epic adventure that awaits as you challenge the oppressive forces shaping your world.

    Dive into SLAVFIGHT and get a taste of the action-packed, story-driven chaos that awaits. Gather your allies, test your skills, and prepare for a glimpse into the thrilling future of SLAVFIGHT.
